title: Donna & Steve's Testimonial
body:
We could not be happier with the amazing photos from our wedding day. Poppy is not only a fantastic photographer but incredibly professional. She listened to what we wanted from a photographer and the style of photos we wanted.

In the nicest possible way we barely noticed she was there on the day, and she captured the real feeling of our wedding. We genuinely cannot recommend her highly enough, you will not be disappointed!
